short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alright, this Chrome extension is like a magical unicorn that farts rainbows and turns your boring old URL into a shiny new one!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly switch between different environments, such as development and staging, while preserving URL parameters.
